Title: XAML Decompiler
Description: Convert binary XAML files in plain text.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This simple utility allows you to convert .XBF files to plain text .XAML files, .XBF files are the binary rappresentation of .XAML files.

Important
This project has been built using the developer preview of .NET Native and so it may not work as expected all the time. Feel free to report bugs at: gcarlo.lelli@live.com

Screenshots


Application Usage
Place all the .xbf files you want to convert inside a directory. Then press the "Pick Directory" button. Once you've selected the directory click "Convert XBF files" button and wait for the application to complete the converting operation. You can read its progress through the Output log box. Make sure you have write permission on that directory.
